install.title: Install Blok
install.description: Add Blok to your project using your favorite package manager.

configure.title: Import and configure
configure.description: Import the editor and tools, then configure your block types.

save.title: Save content
save.description: Extract clean JSON data ready to save anywhere.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.description: Get up and running with Blok in just a few simple steps.

blokClass.title: Blok Class
blokClass.description: The main editor class that initializes and manages the Blok editor instance.

save.name: save()
save.description: Extracts the current editor content as structured JSON data. This is the primary method for persisting editor content.

render.name: render(data)
render.description: Renders editor content from previously saved JSON data.

focus.name: focus(atEnd?)
focus.description: Sets focus to the editor. Optionally positions cursor at the end of content.

clear.name: clear()
clear.description: Removes all blocks from the editor.

destroy.name: destroy()
destroy.description: Destroys the editor instance and removes all DOM elements and event listeners.

isReady.name: isReady
isReady.description: Promise that resolves when editor is ready

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: The configuration object passed to the Blok constructor.

blocksApi.title: Blocks API
blocksApi.description: Manage blocks in the editor — create, delete, update, and reorder content.

blockApi.title: BlockAPI
blockApi.description: Interface for working with individual blocks. Returned by blocks.getById(), blocks.getBlockByIndex(), and blocks.insert().

caretApi.title: Caret API
caretApi.description: Control cursor position and selection within the editor.

eventsApi.title: Events API
eventsApi.description: Subscribe to and manage editor lifecycle events.

historyApi.title: History API
historyApi.description: Control undo/redo functionality for editor operations.

selectionApi.title: Selection API
selectionApi.description: Work with text selection within the editor.

stylesApi.title: Styles API
stylesApi.description: Access CSS class names for styling custom tools and UI elements.

toolbarApi.title: Toolbar API
toolbarApi.description: Control the block toolbar and its state.

inlineToolbarApi.title: InlineToolbar API
inlineToolbarApi.description: Control the inline formatting toolbar (bold, italic, etc.).

sanitizerApi.title: Sanitizer API
sanitizerApi.description: Clean and sanitize HTML content to prevent XSS attacks.

tooltipApi.title: Tooltip API
tooltipApi.description: Display tooltip hints on UI elements.

readOnlyApi.title: ReadOnly API
readOnlyApi.description: Control the read-only state of the editor.

i18nApi.title: I18n API
i18nApi.description: Internationalization support for translating UI strings.

uiApi.title: UI API
uiApi.description: Access to Blok UI elements and state.

listenersApi.title: Listeners API
listenersApi.description: Manage custom DOM event listeners with automatic cleanup.

outputData.title: OutputData
outputData.description: The data structure returned by the save() method.

blockData.title: BlockData
blockData.description: The structure of each block in the blocks array.
